name: Galactic Assault
description:
CONTROLS:

Move with WASD keys and shoot either with left click or the space bar.

Short space shooter created for educational purposes. This game was made as part of GameDev.TV's course on Udemy called Complete C# Unity Developer Course 2D: Learn to Code Making Games.

Want to buy a coffee to a broke student? You can optionally donate if your heart says so, although it's absolutely not required <3
